trans-unit.source: Indicates whether ASP.NET routing is processing a URL from a client or generating a URL.
trans-unit.target: 指示 ASP.NET 路由正处理来自客户端的 URL 还是正在生成 URL。

trans-unit.source: You can use ASP.NET routing to process a URL by matching it to the route definitions in an ASP.NET application, or to generate URLs that are based on the route definitions.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 ASP.NET 路由来处理 URL 匹配到 ASP.NET 应用程序中的 route 定义，或生成基于路由定义的 Url。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteDirection> enumeration provides values that help you differentiate between these scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteDirection>枚举提供了值，可帮助你区分这些方案。

trans-unit.source: This is useful because route constraints are processed differently depending on the scenario.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，因为路由约束的处理方式取决于方案。

trans-unit.source: If you create a custom route constraint by implementing the <xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint> interface, you might have to check the value of the `routeDirection` parameter in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint.Match%2A> method to differentiate the scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过实现来创建自定义的路由约束<xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint>接口，你可能需要检查的值`routeDirection`中的参数<xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint.Match%2A>方法来区分各种方案。

trans-unit.source: A URL from a client is being processed.
trans-unit.target: 正在处理来自客户端的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A URL is being created based on the route definition.
trans-unit.target: 正在根据路由定义创建 URL。
